abstract: Singer Kelly Clarkson, whose latest album Stronger features power-pop hits that dismiss public criticism about her weight, has fostered a distinct relationship with her fans that is less adulation than identification and admiration.
snippet: The singer’s power-pop hits and dismissal of criticism about her weight have fostered a distinct relationship with fans: less that of adulation than of identification and admiration.
lead_paragraph: The singer’s power-pop hits and dismissal of criticism about her weight have fostered a distinct relationship with fans: less that of adulation than of identification and admiration.

headline.main: Kelly Clarkson, a Pop Star Proud in Her Own Skin
headline.print_headline: A Pop Star Proud in Her Own Skin
headline.seo: Kelly Clarkson, the Role Model Next Door
